post:
Own Box offer KVM SSD Windows & Linux VPS hosting based in London, UK from only £1 . That can includes Snapshot backups, Anti DDoS protection and large choice of Linux and Windows distributions to install, our VPS also comes with a feature packed control panel where you can upload your own ISOs, edit rDNS, view VNC, restore snapshots and more.

8 GB SSD disk space,

24x7 UK based Support.
£1 a month ($1.31)

FEATURES
